template.value: ## Display some Insights with graph such as monthly income, growth...

params.src:
update_index_in_matrix.setValue(i);
item_detail_modal.open();

const new_itemData = itemData.value;
new_itemData[update_index_in_matrix.value] = {
  item_id: item_id.value,
  qty: item_qty.value,
  upc: item_upc.value,
  custom_sku: item_custom_sku.value,
  manufact_sku: item_manufact_sku.value,
  tag_ids: item_tags.value,
  price: item_price.value || update_price.value,
  msrp: item_msrp.value || update_msrp.value,
  default_cost: item_default_cost.value || update_default_cost.value,
  is_tax: item_is_tax.value,
  is_pub_to_ecom: item_is_pub_ecom.value,
  tax_class_id: item_tax_class.value
}
itemData.setValue(new_itemData);
item_detail_modal.close();

template.query:
SELECT matrix.id as matrix_id, matrix.name, matrix.vendor_id, vendors.name as vendor_name, matrix.brand_id, brands.name as brand_name, matrix.main_category_id, main.name as main_category, matrix.sub_category1_id, sub1.name as sub_category1, matrix.sub_category2_id, sub2.name as sub_category2, matrix.sub_category3_id, sub3.name as sub_category3, matrix.colors, matrix.sizes, matrix.tag_ids, ARRAY_AGG(tags.name) as tag_names, matrix.type as matrix_type FROM matrix
LEFT JOIN vendors ON vendors.id = matrix.vendor_id
LEFT JOIN brands ON brands.id = matrix.brand_id
LEFT JOIN categories as main ON main.id = matrix.main_category_id
LEFT JOIN categories as sub1 ON sub1.id = matrix.sub_category1_id
LEFT JOIN categories as sub2 ON sub2.id = matrix.sub_category2_id
LEFT JOIN categories as sub3 ON sub3.id = matrix.sub_category3_id
LEFT JOIN tags ON tags.id = ANY(matrix.tag_ids)
 
GROUP BY matrix_id, vendor_name, brand_name, main_category, sub_category1, sub_category2, sub_category3
ORDER BY matrix.created_at DESC
template.transformer:
// Query results are available as the `data` variable
return data

const new_itemData = itemData.value;
new_itemData[item_index.value] = {
  name: item_label.value.substring(25),
  qty: item_qty.value,
  upc: item_upc.value,

  manufact_sku: item_manufact_sku.value,
  price: item_price.value || matrix_price.value,
  msrp: item_msrp.value || matrix_msrp.value,
  default_cost: item_default_cost.value || matrix_default_cost.value,
  tag_ids: item_tags.value,
  tag_strings: item_tags.selectedLabels,
  color: item_color.value,
  size: item_size.value,
  is_tax: item_is_tax.value,
  is_publish_ecom: item_pub_to_ecom.value,
  tax_class_id: item_tax_class.value
}
itemData.setValue(new_itemData);
add_item_modal.close();
